title: Drawing, "Frontispiece for a History of Peter the Great", ca. 1780
medium:
Pen and brown ink, orange wash, black chalk, engraved portrait addition*
Support: white laid paper laid down on blue paper mount
inscribed: inscribed in pen and black ink, on box at left: No. 170/ WTL (monogram)/ W; signed bottom right in pen and black ink: Le Barbier L'ain ; signed in pen and brown ink, on mount: Le Barbier L. ain f.; inscribed in graphite, verso: Laris verre
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Frontispiece for a History of Peter the Great", ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Pen and brown ink, orange wash, black chalk, engraved portrait addition*
Support: white laid paper laid down on blue paper mount. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-209.
